Body.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 5), glass back (Gorilla Glass 5), aluminum frame
Body.SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
Body.\u00a0: IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)

Platform.OS: Android 9.0 (Pie), upgradable to Android 12, One UI 4.1
Platform.Chipset: Exynos 9820 (8 nm) - EMEA/LATAMQualcomm SM8150 Snapdragon 855 (7 nm) - USA/China
Platform.CPU: Octa-core (2x2.73 GHz Mongoose M4 & 2x2.31 GHz Cortex-A75 & 4x1.95 GHz Cortex-A55) - EMEA/LATAMOcta-core (1x2.84 GHz Kryo 485 & 3x2.42 GHz Kryo 485 & 4x1.78 GHz Kryo 485) - USA/China

Memory.Card slot: microSDXC (uses shared SIM slot) - dual SIM model only

Main Camera.Dual:
12 MP, f/1.5-2.4, 26mm (wide), 1/2.55", 1.4µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS
16 MP, f/2.2, 12mm (ultrawide), 1/3.1", 1.0µm, Super Steady video
Main Camera.Video: 4K@60fps (no EIS), 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60/240fps, 720p@960fps, HDR10+, stereo sound rec., gyro-EIS & OIS

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer

ANT+
Bixby natural language commands and dictation
